name: TT Document Commission
query:
SELECT 
    `tabTT Document`.name as 'TT Number', 
    `tabTT Document Detail`.against_voucher_no as 'Sales Invoice No', 
    `tabTT Document`.status as 'TT Status', 
    `tabTT Document`.total_amount as 'Total Outstanding Amount',
    `tabTT Document`.grand_total, 
    `tabTT Document Detail`.sales_person as 'TT Sales Person', 
    `tabSales Team`.sales_person as 'SalesTeamMember', 
    `tabSales Team`.allocated_amount as 'Total Allocated Contribution',
    `tabSales Team`.calculated_commission as "Sales Commission:Currency:70" 
FROM
    `tabTT Document` inner join `tabTT Document Detail` 
             on `tabTT Document`.name = `tabTT Document Detail`.parent 
                     left join `tabSales Invoice` 
             on `tabTT Document Detail`.parent = `tabSales Invoice`.name 
                     left join `tabSales Team` 
             on `tabSales Team`.parent = `tabTT Document Detail`.against_voucher_no;
